prompts: Create a dragon-type Pokemon that dominates the skies with fierce red wings and sharp teeth.
I want a powerful ground-type Pokemon that has a sleek body and intimidating presence.
Generate a Pokemon with a robust build, showcasing a mix of dark and vibrant colors.
Make a fierce dragon Pokemon with a unique color palette that blends red, blue, and yellow.
Imagine a Pokemon that can traverse mountains and caves, equipped with sharp claws and wings.
Design a dragon-type creature with a fearsome appearance and a bold color scheme.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies strength and agility, with distinct dragon-like features.
